name: KnowBot
0:
”Alexa ask Know Bot Who won the 1976 World Series?”
”Alexa ask Know Bot How far is it from the Earth to the Sun?”
”Alexa ask Know Bot Who was the Wizard of Menlo Park?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: know bot
des: KnowBot is here to answer simple questions! Simply ask KnowBot: "Who won the 1976 World Series?" or "How far is it from the Earth to the Sun?" KnowBot will give you a simple answer! If KnowBot doesn't know the answer right away, don't worry! It will work to find an answer to your question, so the next time you ask, it will have your answer ready! The more you ask, the more it learns!
